Articles.Content: Thank You To Everyone Who Is Reading This, I Would Like To Start A Kerbal Space Program Youtube Channel But I Do Not Know A Good Screen Recorder If You Have Any Suggestions For Free Recorders Please Tell Me And At The Start Of My Videos I Will Mention You, So Please Help Me Thank You Very Much.

A good screen recorder eh?

Well, let's see.

Have you tried googling "free screen recording program"?

If that turns up something, before downloading ANYTHING google "is program [Redacted] Safe for use"

If you use mac, quicktime player comes with it, and can do audio, movie, and screen recordings.

I use it for my animations. and also a few videos.

So i would recommend that if you use mac

For pc... Well... There's Fraps (i think that's free)

I don't use PC, so i wouldn't know.
